title: Balance Point Veterinary Acupuncture Services
cleaned_text: Balance Point Veterinary Acupuncture Services aims to utilize Traditional Chinese Veterinary Medicine (TCVM) principles to evaluate and treat small animal patients holistically to correct imbalances or weaknesses and to promote healing, pain management, and wellness. Dr. Gabriel DVM, CVA will work closely with your regular veterinarian to develop an individual treatment plan for your pet. Dr. Gabriel performs acupuncture therapy in a home-based treatment room to provide a calming and quiet environment for the patient Balance Point Veterinary Acupuncture Services does not provide general veterinary care, and acupuncture treatments are meant to complement any therapy your pet is receiving from your regular veterinarian. Prior to the first appointment, Dr. Gabriel asks that you please download, print, and fill out the four (4) forms using the 4 links below.
